dimensions:
Warp: 265 cm [104"]  Cut top and bottom.
Weft:   102 cm [40"]     Selvedge to selvedge.
title: Textile
medium: Technique: green warp, blue and gold alternating weft, and gold and silver brocading. The metallic threads are wrapped on a core thread.
description: A pattern of gold deer and silver birds in a forest of blue trees on a green background.
name: Textile
